title: Gifts Of Travel
description:
Under San Francisco Campaign & Governmental Conduct Code Section 3.216(d) elected officers are required to file the Gifts of Travel form before accepting a gift of transportation, lodging, or subsistence for any out-of-state travel that is paid for in part by an individual or entity other than the City and County of San Francisco, another governmental body, or a bona-fide educational institution as defined in section 203 of the Revenue and Taxation Code, or that is paid for by the City in whole or in part with funds donated by any of those individuals or entities. An elected officer who reimburses an individual or entity for a gift of transportation, lodging or subsistence related to out-of-state travel must also file this form within 30 days of the reimbursement. For more information visit www.sfethics.org.

Each row on this table represents the contents of a Gifts of Travel form filed with the Ethics Commission.  There are two sub-tables of information on the Gifts of Travel form: Accompanying Persons and Contributors.  These sub-tables are provided in JSON format in the "AccompanyingPersons" and "Contributors" fields.  The same information may also be accessed via the endpoints provided in "AccompanyingPersonsSubTableQuery" and "ContributorsSubTableQuery" fields to separate datasets: Accompanying Persons ( https://data.sfgov.org/City-Management-and-Ethics/Gifts-of-Travel-Accompanying-Individuals/gqui-q3n5 )Contributors ( https://data.sfgov.org/City-Management-and-Ethics/Gifts-of-Travel-Contributors/hpj3-vnwh ).  Join the this dataset with the sub-tables using the DocuSignID.

This dataset includes filings from March 2018 to the present.  For historic filings, see https://data.sfgov.org/d/uqhk-vesf.

columns.name: DocuSignID
columns.description: Unique ID number of DocuSign filing.  Use to join with contributor and accompanying persons tables.

columns.name: Filing
columns.description: URL pointing to PDF download of the filing.

columns.name: FilingType
columns.description: Original (original filing of document), Amendment (amending a prior filing.  Use "OriginalFilingDate" column to get date of original filing), or Supplemental (Continuing a filing due to lack of space on document.  This would be used if there were too many contributors or accompanying persons on original filing to fit on the document).

columns.name: OriginalFilingDate
columns.description: Date of original filing if the filing is an amendment.

columns.name: ElectedOfficerName
columns.description: Name of Elected Officer that signed the document and received the gift of travel.

columns.name: ElectedOfficerPosition
columns.description: Position of the Elected Official

columns.name: ElectedOfficerEmail
columns.description: E-mail address of the Elected Official

columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of the filing.  This date should be the same as the "DateSigned" column.

columns.name: PurposeTrip
columns.description: A description of the purpose of the trip.

columns.name: StartDate
columns.description: Start date of the trip.

columns.name: EndDate
columns.description: End date of the trip.

columns.name: Itinerary
columns.description: The trip itinerary.

columns.name: EntityStreet
columns.description: Street address of the entity or individual funding the gift of transportation, lodging or subsistence.

columns.name: EntityCity
columns.description: City of the entity or individual funding the gift of transportation, lodging or subsistence.

columns.name: EntityState
columns.description: State of the entity or individual funding the gift of transportation, lodging or subsistence.

columns.name: EntityZip
columns.description: Zip code of the entity or individual funding the gift of transportation, lodging or subsistence.

columns.name: EntityContactPersonName
columns.description: Name of the contact person for the entity or individual funding the gift of transportation, lodging or subsistence.

columns.name: EntityContactPersonTelephone
columns.description: Phone number for the entity or individual funding the gift of transportation, lodging or subsistence.

columns.name: EntityContactPersonEmail
columns.description: Email for the entity or individual funding the gift of transportation, lodging or subsistence.

columns.name: AmountGifted
columns.description: Amount for costs that will be paid by the entity or individual to fund travel for the elected officer, including but not limited to the amount directly related to the cost of transportation, lodging and subsistence.

columns.name: AmountFamilyMembers
columns.description: Amount for costs that will be paid by the entity or individual to fund travel for the elected officer's family members (if applicable), including but not limited to the amount directly related to the cost of transportation, lodging and subsistence.

columns.name: AmountReimbursed
columns.description: If the gift was reimbursed by the elected officer, the amount reimbursed to the entity or individual

columns.name: ReimbursementType
columns.description: Full or partial reimbursement.

columns.name: ReimbursementDate
columns.description: Date of reimbursement

columns.name: FairMarketValueProcess
columns.description: Process used to determine the fair market value of the trip costs.  Only completed when there is a full or partial reimbursement.

columns.name: AccompanyingPersonsSubTableQuery
columns.description:
URL to endpoint to query sub-table including a list of the name of any individual accompanying the elected officer on the trip who is:
(A) A City employee required to file a Statement of Economic Interests
(B) A lobbyist or campaign consultant registered with the Ethics Commission
(C) An employee of or individual who has an ownership interest in a lobbyist or campaign consultant
registered with the Ethics Commission
(D) An employee or officer of the entity that will pay for the gift of transportation, lodging or subsistence,
and who is accompanying the elected officer on the trip.  Results return in JSON format. Join the tables using the DocuSignID.

columns.name: AdditionalAccompanyingPerson
columns.description: If more than 40 individuals accompany the elected official on a trip then a X is reported.  Filer will file a second form with additional accompanying persons the "FilingType" as "Supplemental".

columns.name: ContributorsSubTableQuery
columns.description:
URL to endpoint to query sub-table including a list of the name, occupation and employer of any contributor who contributed more than $500 to the
entity funding the trip and whose contributions were used in whole or in part to fund the trip.  Results return in JSON format. Join the tables using the DocuSignID.

columns.name: AdditionalContributors
columns.description: If more than 80 contributors are on the contributor sub-table then a X is reported.  Filer will file a second form with additional accompanying persons the "FilingType" as "Supplemental".
